hero.description: OpenRobotX is the next-generation open-source community for Embodied AI. Connecting developers worldwide, from mechanical structures to neural networks, we're defining the future of robotics together.

home.badge: Open Source · Embodied AI · Humanoid Robots
home.title: Open Robot X
home.subtitle: Open-source embodied intelligence community. Focus on Humanoid, Embodied AI, ROS and open-source robotics. Connect developers and enthusiasts to advance the next generation of robotics.
home.featuresSubtitle: From company showcase to parameter comparison, everything about humanoid robotics
home.topCompaniesSubtitle: The world's most influential humanoid robot companies. Click to learn more.
home.robotCompareSubtitle: Mainstream humanoid robot models, DOF, payload, battery life and AI capabilities at a glance.
home.subscribeSubtitle: Subscribe to Open Robot X updates and get the latest humanoid robot and embodied AI industry news.

news.title: Industry News
news.subtitle: Latest updates, in-depth analysis, and funding reports in humanoid robots, embodied intelligence, and open-source robotics

agiPath.title: The Path to AGI
agiPath.subtitle: Key events and milestones on the road to humanoid robots, embodied intelligence, and artificial general intelligence
agiPath.empty: No timeline events yet. Stay tuned.

auth.loginExpiredDesc: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

subscribeModal.title: Subscribe Rules
subscribeModal.intro: Please read the following rules and terms before subscribing to better use our email subscription service.
subscribeModal.content: After subscribing, you will receive the latest updates and industry news from Open Robot X. Please scroll to the bottom of the page to complete your subscription.
subscribeModal.rule1Desc: You will receive curated updates from Open Robot X: open-source humanoid robots, embodied AI and Humanoid industry news, new products and milestones, community events and live stream announcements.
subscribeModal.rule2Desc: We typically send 1-2 emails per week. Extra editions may be sent for major events. No spam—you can unsubscribe anytime.
subscribeModal.rule3Desc: Each email includes an unsubscribe link at the bottom. One click to opt out, no extra steps required.
subscribeModal.rule4Desc: We only use your email to send subscription content. We do not sell or share your data with third parties. After unsubscribing, we will no longer send emails to that address.
